snippet: Fernando Haddad’s efforts have unleashed a fierce debate over mobility, the utilization of public spaces and the limits of political power in São Paulo.
abstract: Sao Paulo Journal; Sao Paulo, Brazil, Mayor Fernando Haddad is leading ambitious movement to make city more pedestrian- and bike-friendly; effort faces pushback from his opponents, who have criticized breadth and depth of his policies; shows limits of political power mayor has in metropolitan area where many place high value on cars.
lead_paragraph: Fernando Haddad’s efforts have unleashed a fierce debate over mobility, the utilization of public spaces and the limits of political power in São Paulo.

headline.print_headline: Fighting Resistance, a Mayor Strives to Ease Gridlock in a Brazilian Megacity
headline.main: Fighting Resistance, a Mayor Strives to Ease Gridlock in a Brazilian Megacity
